  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205338</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">All Natural: Jim Denevan and Chris Drury</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ganz Natürlich: Jim Denevan und Chris 
Drury</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tout Normal : Jim Denevan et Chris 
Drury</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Toda Natural: Jim Denevan e Chris Drury</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tutto il Naturale: Jim Denevan e Chris 
Drury</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όλοι φυσικοί: Jim Denevan και Chris 
Drury</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Todo Natural: Jim Denevan y Chris Drury</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">SPARK tails artists Jim Denevan and Cris Drury as they create large earth works. This Educator Guide is about the history and tradition of artists making work in and about the natural environment.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">FUNKEN-Endstückkünstler Jim Denevan und Cris 
Drury, wie sie große Masse Arbeiten erstellen. Diese 
Erzieher-Anleitung ist über die Geschichte und die Tradition der 
Künstler, die Arbeit und über in der natürlichen Umgebung bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Artistes Jim Denevan et Cris Drury de queues 
d'ÉTINCELLE comme ils créent de grands travaux de la terre. Ce
guide d'éducateur est au sujet de l'histoire et de la tradition des 
artistes faisant le travail dans et au sujet de l'environnement 
normal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artistas Jim Denevan e Cris Drury das caudas da 
FAÍSCA como críam trabalhos grandes da terra. Esta guia do 
educador é sobre o history e a tradição dos artistas que fazem o 
trabalho e sobre no ambiente natural.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Artisti Jim Denevan e Cris Drury delle code della 
SCINTILLA come creano i grandi impianti della terra. Questa 
guida dell'educatore è circa la storia e la tradizione degli artisti 
che fanno il lavoro in e circa l'ambiente naturale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ΣΠΙΝΘΗΡΑΣ παρακολουθεί τους καλλιτέχνες jim 
Denevan και Cris Drury δεδομένου ότι δημιουργούν τις 
μεγάλες γήινες εργασίες. Αυτός ο οδηγός εκπαιδευτικών 
είναι για την ιστορία και την παράδοση καλλιτεχνών που κάνουν την
εργασία σε και για το φυσικό περιβάλλον.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artistas Jim Denevan y Cris Drury de las colas de 
la CHISPA como crean trabajos grandes de la tierra. Esta guía 
del educador está sobre la historia y la tradición de los artistas 
que hacen el trabajo en y sobre el ambiente natural.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          <identifier>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
